(ROOT
  (SINV
    (ADVP (RB Here))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN episode))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Frontline))))
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB first))
        (VBN aired)
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (NNP Ch) (CD 8)))
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (CD 3)))))
    (NP (NNP May))))


advmod(aired-8, Here-1)
auxpass(aired-8, is-2)
det(episode-4, the-3)
attr(aired-8, episode-4)
prep(episode-4, of-5)
pobj(of-5, Frontline-6)
advmod(aired-8, first-7)
root(ROOT-0, aired-8)
prep(aired-8, on-9)
pobj(on-9, Ch-10)
num(Ch-10, 8-11)
prep(aired-8, on-12)
pobj(on-12, 3-13)
nsubjpass(aired-8, May-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD 2013))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (CD 10.30))))
    (VP (VBP pm))
    (. .)))


nsubj(pm-4, 2013-1)
prep(2013-1, at-2)
pobj(at-2, 10.30-3)
root(ROOT-0, pm-4)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNS Thanks))
    (PP (TO to)
      (NP (NNP Sen)))
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP (DT the) (JJ video) (NN upload)))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
prep(Thanks-1, to-2)
pobj(to-2, Sen-3)
prep(Thanks-1, for-4)
det(upload-7, the-5)
amod(upload-7, video-6)
pobj(for-4, upload-7)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (ADVP (RB Here))
    (VP (VBP are))
    (NP
      (NP (CD two))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNS stalls))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT that))
            (S
              (VP (VBD were)
                (VP (VBN featured))))))))
    (: :)))


advmod(are-2, Here-1)
root(ROOT-0, are-2)
nsubj(are-2, two-3)
prep(two-3, of-4)
det(stalls-6, the-5)
pobj(of-4, stalls-6)
nsubjpass(featured-9, that-7)
auxpass(featured-9, were-8)
rcmod(stalls-6, featured-9)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (CD 1))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, 1-1)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (NNP Xiao) (NNP Di) (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee))
    (NP (CD 2))
    (. .)))


nn(Mee-4, Xiao-1)
nn(Mee-4, Di-2)
nn(Mee-4, Hokkien-3)
root(ROOT-0, Mee-4)
dep(Mee-4, 2-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Heaven) (NNP Putu) (NNP Mayyam))
    (ADVP (RB Here))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (NN bottomline)))
    (: :)))


nn(Mayyam-3, Heaven-1)
nn(Mayyam-3, Putu-2)
nsubj(bottomline-7, Mayyam-3)
advmod(bottomline-7, Here-4)
cop(bottomline-7, is-5)
det(bottomline-7, the-6)
root(ROOT-0, bottomline-7)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (VBP want)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB be)
              (ADJP (JJ able)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB eat)
                      (ADJP (JJ good))))))))))
      (, ,))))


mark(want-3, If-1)
nsubj(want-3, we-2)
root(ROOT-0, want-3)
aux(able-6, to-4)
cop(able-6, be-5)
xcomp(want-3, able-6)
aux(eat-8, to-7)
xcomp(able-6, eat-8)
acomp(eat-8, good-9)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (JJ traditional) (NN hawker) (NN food))
    (PP (IN in)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN future))
        (, ,)))))


amod(food-3, traditional-1)
nn(food-3, hawker-2)
root(ROOT-0, food-3)
prep(food-3, in-4)
det(future-6, the-5)
pobj(in-4, future-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBP need)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB nurture)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ next) (NN generation))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNS hawkers))))
            (ADVP (RB now))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(need-2, we-1)
root(ROOT-0, need-2)
aux(nurture-4, to-3)
xcomp(need-2, nurture-4)
det(generation-7, the-5)
amod(generation-7, next-6)
dobj(nurture-4, generation-7)
prep(generation-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, hawkers-9)
advmod(nurture-4, now-10)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (VBP continue)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB complain)
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB whenever))
                (S
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ young) (NN hawker))
                  (VP (VBZ raises)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NN price))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP
                          (NP (PRP$ his) (NN plate))
                          (PP (IN of)
                            (NP (NNP Hokkien) (NNP Mee))))))
                    (PP (IN by)
                      (NP (CD 50) (NNS cents) (, ,)))))))))))))


mark(continue-3, If-1)
nsubj(continue-3, we-2)
root(ROOT-0, continue-3)
aux(complain-5, to-4)
xcomp(continue-3, complain-5)
advmod(raises-10, whenever-6)
det(hawker-9, a-7)
amod(hawker-9, young-8)
nsubj(raises-10, hawker-9)
advcl(complain-5, raises-10)
det(price-12, the-11)
dobj(raises-10, price-12)
prep(price-12, of-13)
poss(plate-15, his-14)
pobj(of-13, plate-15)
prep(plate-15, of-16)
nn(Mee-18, Hokkien-17)
pobj(of-16, Mee-18)
prep(raises-10, by-19)
num(cents-21, 50-20)
pobj(by-19, cents-21)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (NP (PRP he))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB end)
        (PRT (RP up))
        (S
          (VP (VBG selling)
            (NP (NN pasta))
            (ADVP (RB instead))))))
    (. !)))


advmod(end-4, then-1)
nsubj(end-4, he-2)
aux(end-4, will-3)
root(ROOT-0, end-4)
prt(end-4, up-5)
xcomp(end-4, selling-6)
dobj(selling-6, pasta-7)
advmod(selling-6, instead-8)
